content: this legal text provides an overview of a case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the court has ordered one party referred to as f to pay the mediation costs totaling €600 for the ongoing legal proceedings f is also required to pay fees for the merit phase €5077 and the precautionary phase €2300 of the proceedings as well as reimburse general expenses and vat the court has determined that f is responsible for paying the costs of the technical expert appointed by the court but the exact amount is not mentioned the case spans over four years from november 13 2018 to december 12 2022 the court has ordered a certain party to release an apartment and a garage located in naples italy to another party the condemned party is also required to pay the plaintiff €1623114 plus legal interest the case is being heard in the court of naples and the decision hearing is scheduled for 04072022 the plaintiff is represented by avv ll and the defendantcounterclaimer is represented by avv omiss the court has declared that the plaintiff holds joint ownership of certain properties without title and has ordered the defendant to release these properties and pay an occupancy indemnity the court has dismissed counterclaims made by the defendant and awarded costs and fees to the plaintiff the court has made a final judgment in the case
